00030 OSGTriangleMeshVisualizer::OSGTriangleMeshVisualizer() {
00031         rootGeode = new osg::Group();
00032         viewer.setSceneData(rootGeode);
00033         viewer.setUpViewInWindow(10, 10, 500, 500);
00034         //viewer.setThreadingModel(osgViewer::ViewerBase::SingleThreaded);
00035         viewer.addEventHandler(new osgViewer::StatsHandler);
00036         viewer.addEventHandler(new osgViewer::WindowSizeHandler);
00037         viewer.addEventHandler(new osgGA::StateSetManipulator(viewer.getCamera()->getOrCreateStateSet()) );
00038 }

00041 //      delete rootGeode;
00042 }
00043 
00044 void OSGTriangleMeshVisualizer::addTriangleMesh(ITriangleMesh* mesh) {
00045         rootGeode->addChild(createTriangleMeshNode(mesh));
00046 }
00047 
00048 void OSGTriangleMeshVisualizer::visualize() {
00049 //      osg::Point* point=new osg::Point;
00050 //      point->setSize(2.0f);
00051 //      rootGeode->getOrCreateStateSet()->setAttribute(point);
00052         viewer.run(); // run();
00053 }

00056 osg::ref_ptr<osg::Node> OSGTriangleMeshVisualizer::createTriangleMeshNode(ITriangleMesh* mesh, float red, float green, float blue, float alpha) {
00057         osg::ref_ptr<osg::Geode> geode = new osg::Geode;
00058         osg::ref_ptr<osg::TriangleMesh> osgMesh = createTriangleMesh(mesh);
00059         osg::ref_ptr<osg::ShapeDrawable> drawable = new osg::ShapeDrawable(osgMesh);
00060 
00061         drawable->setColor(osg::Vec4(red, green, blue, alpha)); // TODO: changeable colors...
00062         geode->addDrawable(drawable);
00063         geode->setDataVariance(osg::Object::DYNAMIC);
00064 
00065 //      osg::Group* group = new osg::Group;
00066         osg::ref_ptr<osg::Group> group = new osg::Group;
00067         group->addChild(geode);
00068 
00069         return group;
00070 }
00071 
00072 osg::ref_ptr<osg::TriangleMesh> OSGTriangleMeshVisualizer::createTriangleMesh(ITriangleMesh* mesh) {
00073         int nVertices;
00074         int nTriangles;
00075         osg::ref_ptr<osg::Vec3Array> vertices = new osg::Vec3Array;
00076         osg::ref_ptr<osg::IntArray> indices = new osg::IntArray;
00077         Point3D tmpVertex;
00078 
00079         //this is a smart converter... ;-)
00080         TriangleMeshImplicit* meshImplicit = dynamic_cast<TriangleMeshImplicit*>(mesh);
00081         if (meshImplicit != NULL) { //here we exploit knowledge about the implicit triangle representation
00082 
00083                 nVertices = meshImplicit->getNumberOfVertices();
00084                 nTriangles = meshImplicit->getSize(); //TODO: correct size
00085                 vertices = new osg::Vec3Array(nVertices);
00086                 indices = new osg::IntArray(nTriangles * 3);
00087 
00088                 for (int i=0; i < nVertices; ++i) {
00089                         tmpVertex = (*meshImplicit->getVertices())[i];
00090                         (*vertices)[i] = osg::Vec3(
00091                                         //static_cast<value_type>(tmpVertex.getX()),
00092                                         tmpVertex.getX(), // TODO: cast ?
00093                                         tmpVertex.getY(),
00094                                         tmpVertex.getZ());
00095                 }
00096 
00097                 int iOld = 0;
00098                 int iNew = 0;
00099                 for (int i=0; i < nTriangles; ++i) {
00100                         (*indices)[iNew++] = (*meshImplicit->getIndices())[iOld++];
00101                         (*indices)[iNew++] = (*meshImplicit->getIndices())[iOld++];
00102                         (*indices)[iNew++] = (*meshImplicit->getIndices())[iOld++];
00103                 }
00104 
00105         } else { // here we go with the generic (possible less efficient) representation
00106 
00107                 nTriangles = mesh->getSize();
00108                 nVertices = (nTriangles * 3);
00109                 vertices = new osg::Vec3Array(nVertices);
00110                 indices = new osg::IntArray(nTriangles * 3);
00111 
00112                 int indexCount = 0;
00113                 for (int i =0 ; i < nTriangles; ++i) { // loop over all triangles
00114                         for (int j = 0; j <= 2; ++j) { // loop over the three vertices per triangle
00115                                 tmpVertex = *mesh->getTriangleVertex(i,j);
00116                                                 (*vertices)[indexCount] = osg::Vec3(
00117                                         //static_cast<value_type>(tmpVertex.getX()),
00118                                         tmpVertex.getX(), // TODO: cast?
00119                                         tmpVertex.getY(),
00120                                         tmpVertex.getZ());
00121 
00122                                 (*indices)[indexCount] = indexCount; //one-to-one mapping
00123                                 indexCount++;
00124                         }
00125                 }
00126         }
00127 
00128         osg::ref_ptr<osg::TriangleMesh> osgMesh = new osg::TriangleMesh();
00129 //      std::cout << std::endl << *mesh;
00130         osgMesh->setVertices(vertices);
00131         osgMesh->setIndices(indices);
00132         return osgMesh;
00133 }
00134 
00135 }
